document_data.name: Nurr'Korzahg
document_data.mainbody: '''Nurr'Korzahg''' was an [[illithid]] of [[Ch'Chitl]] in the [[Northdark]] of the [[Underdark]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: A close meeting with death shook Nurr'Korzahg deeply. It started considering if one could live without subjugating inferior beings and eating their brains. Nurr'Korzahg thought about helping non-illithids, just to see what would happen in such occasions.
document_data.History: At one point, Nurr'korzahg contracted a rotting illness that threatened its life. He ultimately survived, only losing three tentacles to amputation.
